template.p:
Hello there!
You just installed the Odoo for Hardware Shop package. By doing so, we have installed a bunch of necessary apps to run your shop efficiently.
Discover the basics of this package and explore all the possibilities Odoo offers to improve your experience.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If you want to execute a practical guided tour of this module, you should Import demo data and try the¬†Use Case.

div.a: Do you want to go further?

template.p: You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: Use the Point of Sale for your sales at the desk. You can directly order new products for your customers and manage their accounts and advantages. You will also have the possibility to sale in your shop and choose to ship later the order.
Use the Sales App to create quotations/sales orders for your business clients and invoice them on the go using the Invoicing App.
Use the Purchase App to order products from your suppliers.
Use the Inventory App to manage your orders receive and deliver your products.
Use the Barcode App to scan your products and create new entries directly from this App to encode new products faster than ever.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Odoo is entirely integrated into an App. Download it to turn your phone into an additional scanner (and much more).

template.p: By uploading this module's demo data, your database has been filled with a few products and 2 sample contacts.
You should be able to execute the following flows to have an overview of various flows you can quickly implement with this package using Odoo.
Of course, this is just an overview of the features included in this package. Feel free to add new apps, delete/modify demo data, and test everything around!

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-warning pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You didn't import demo data? You can still do it. Go to Apps > Industries > Upgrade your Hardware Shop package and check the related box.

template.p: From the Point of sale, open your register on the main dashboard.

ol.li: Welcome your customer Ace Hardware, a B2B customer. They need 2 Aqua Double Soap Dish.
Ace Hardware is already registered in your database; select it using the "Customer" button.
Register Ace Hardware's payment. You can now go back to your main dashboard by selecting "Backend" in the top-right burger menu.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You can see that Ace Hardware benefits from a specific pricelist rebate of 5% on everything they buy. Manage pricelists by navigating to Products > Pricelists.

ol.li: If you go back to your Point of Sale, you can start a new order for 5 units of Asian. Water Proofing Hydroloc for Ferrous Hardware, another B2B customer.
As you do not have enough products on hand, plan the shipping for later. On the payment screen, you can select the "Ship Later" button and enter the date you expect the shipment to be made.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Notice that if you need the delivery to be paid by your customer, you can create a delivery product and add it to its cart. In this demo, you can use the "POS Delivery" to add a 5,00 Excl. Taxes delivery price.

template.p: Let's say your customer Ace Hardware just called you to order 30 Asian. Water Proofing Hydroloc.

ol.li: Navigate to your Sales App. You can now create a new Sales Order by clicking the "New" button, top left.
Add your customer, and the product they want.

template.p: That's it. You can now send the quotation by email, or confirm it directly for this demo purpose. This order is now placed.
Now that we have placed all these orders, it's time to purchase missing products.

ol.li: If you navigate to your "Purchase App", you can see that a new Purchase Order for Ferrous Hardware has been automatically generated. It will ensure a replenishment for Asian. Water Proofing Hydroloc.
You just need to send the Request For Quotation by email, or to confirm it manually once the order is placed.
Once the order is placed, you can see that the top left button switches to "Receive products". Click it to open your receipt order and validate it to confirm that this product is back in stock.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p:
You can observe that the Purchase Order suggests a replenishment of 100 products. This is due to the existing "Reordering rule" on this specific product.
The reordering rule will ensure that our stock doesn't go below the minimum quantity indicated and replenishes to the maximum quantity encoded.

template.p: As we now have our Asian. Water Proofing Hydroloc back in stock, we can deliver it to our patient customers.

ol.li: Navigate to the Inventory App and select "X to process" in the Delivery Orders.
Select each order, the one for Ferrous Hardware and the one for Ace Hardware.
Validate the shipment with the top left main button.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You completed that demo use case! There are millions of other ways to adapt your Odoo setup to fit your business needs.¬†
